```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("naniar")
library("tidyverse")
library("janitor")
```

# Loading the data
```{r}
crime <- read_csv("data/Crime_Data_from_2020_to_Present.csv")%>%
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
naniar::miss_var_summary(crime)
```

# Crimes most common in LA
```{r}
crime%>%
  count(crm_cd_desc, sort = T)%>%
  top_n(10, crm_cd_desc)
```
